queries.addUser: INSERT INTO users (email, username, user_password, first_name, last_name, code) VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4, $5, $6) RETURNING *;
queries.updateUser: UPDATE users SET username = $1, email = $2, first_name = $3, last_name = $4, user_password = $5 WHERE id_user = $6 RETURNING *;
queries.updateUser2: UPDATE users SET username = $1, email = $2, first_name = $3, last_name = $4 WHERE id_user = $5 RETURNING *;
queries.getUser: SELECT * FROM users WHERE email = $1 OR username = $2
queries.verifyPass: SELECT user_password FROM users WHERE id_user = $1
queries.recoverPass: UPDATE users SET code = $1, user_password = $2 WHERE id_user = $3;
queries.getCode: SELECT id_user FROM users WHERE code = $1
queries.updateCode: UPDATE users SET code = $1 WHERE id_user = $2 RETURNING *;
queries.resetUserId2: WITH updated AS (SELECT id_user, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY id_user) AS new_id FROM users) UPDATE users SET id_user = updated.new_id FROM updated WHERE users.id_user = updated.id_user;
queries.resetUserId3: SELECT setval('users_id_user_seq', COALESCE((SELECT MAX(id_user) FROM users), 0) + 1);
